name: npc_dota_hero_storm_spirit
bio_loc: Storm Spirit is literally a force of nature--the wild power of wind and weather, bottled in human form. And a boisterous, jovial, irrepressible form it is! As jolly as a favorite uncle, he injects every scene with crackling energy. But it was not always thus, and there was tragedy in his creation. Generations ago, in the plains beyond the Wailing Mountains, a good people lay starving in drought and famine. A simple elementalist, Thunderkeg by name, used a forbidden spell to summon the spirit of the storm, asking for rain. Enraged at this mortal's presumption, the Storm Celestial known as Raijin lay waste to the land, scouring it bare with winds and flood. Thunderkeg was no match for the Celestial--at least until he cast a suicidal spell that forged their fates into one: he captured the Celestial in the cage of his own body. Trapped together, Thunderkeg's boundless good humor fused with Raijin's crazed energy, creating the jovial Raijin Thunderkeg, a Celestial who walks the world in physical form.
hype_loc: Storm Spirit is never one to miss a fight. Zipping from across the battlefield in a bolt of lightning, he strikes enemies from every direction with exploding remnants and charged attacks, then disappears while his enemies are still scrambling to react.
npe_desc_loc: Zips across the map to engage in fights

facets.description_loc: Electric Vortex applies a debuff that triggers an Overload Charge if they attack.
facets.name: storm_spirit_shock_collar

abilities.name: storm_spirit_static_remnant
abilities.desc_loc: Creates an explosively charged image of Storm Spirit that lasts %abilityduration% seconds and will detonate and deal damage if an enemy unit comes near it.
abilities.lore_loc: Raijin Thunderkeg's duality allows him to admire himself in shocking fashion.
notes_loc: Remnants take %static_remnant_delay% second to materialize after the spell is cast.
Remnants grant unobstructed vision for their duration.
The explosion actually hits units in a %static_remnant_damage_radius% radius, but will only be triggered in %static_remnant_radius%.
Can be self-cast to cast in place.
facets_loc: Static Remnants spawn at Storm Spirit and move to the target position.

abilities.name: storm_spirit_electric_vortex
abilities.desc_loc: A vortex that pulls an enemy unit to Storm Spirit's location.
abilities.lore_loc: Raijin's thunderous, boisterous energy often draws others into an electrifying situation.
abilities.scepter_loc: Electric Vortex affects all enemies within a radius around Storm Spirit.
facets_loc: Electric Vortex applies a debuff to the enemy that lasts for %enemy_overload_duration%s that triggers an Overload Charge if they attack.

abilities.name: storm_spirit_overload
abilities.desc_loc: Casting a spell creates an electrical charge, which is released in a burst on Storm's next attack, dealing damage and slowing nearby enemies.
abilities.shard_loc: Can be activated to grant Storm Spirit and nearby allied heroes %shard_activation_charges% Overload charges. Provides bonus Attack Speed. Lasts up to %shard_activation_duration% seconds or until the charges are depleted.

abilities.name: storm_spirit_ball_lightning
abilities.desc_loc: Storm Spirit becomes volatile electricity, charging across the battlefield until he depletes his mana or reaches his target. The activation mana cost is %ball_lightning_initial_mana_base%+%ball_lightning_initial_mana_percentage%%% of his total mana pool, and the cost per 100 units traveled is %ball_lightning_travel_cost_base%+%ball_lightning_travel_cost_percent%%% of his total mana pool.  Damage is expressed in damage per 100 units traveled.
notes_loc: Abilities and items can be used while traveling.
Storm Spirit is invulnerable during Ball Lightning.

abilities.name: storm_spirit_galvanized
abilities.desc_loc: Storm Spirit gains a charge of %mp_per_kill% mana regeneration per kill. Loses %charges_per_death% charges per death. Leveling Ball Lightning gives Storm Spirit %charges_per_ult% bonus charges. Additionally every time he gains a charge he also gains %perma_mp_per_kill% Mana Regen permanently.

talents.name: special_bonus_unique_storm_spirit_4
talents.name_loc: {s:value} Distance Auto Remnant in Ball Lightning
talents.desc_loc: Every {s:value} distance travelled in Ball Lightning creates a Static Remnant.
